name: F1 2011
description: The official FORMULA ONE™ game returns with new circuits, split-screen and co-op Championship modes plus all the cars and stars from the 2011 season. Debut ahead of the drivers at India’s Buddh International Circuit, race the iconic Nürburgring circuit for the first time in High Definition and take on Abu Dhabi with a spectacular new day...

reviews.review_text: Over 200 fun filled hours with this game but no longer playable sue to Games For Windows shut down so no save games will work, you can no longer do any more than a single race. Very sad that no fix has been put in place for this.  Still the best games in the series.
F1 2011 works on Windows 8 and 10. Stop complaining about it.
Solid game in the F1 series. Fun to play around with.
Fantasic F1 Game, one of the best in the series.

If you like the realism and the thrill of being in a Formula 1 car, driving around the worl famous tracks around the world, this is the game for you. Definitely best played with a wheel and pedals. It will take some time getting used to all the settings and the tuning options, however the community for the F1 series is great. ask away at any forum and theyll be glad to help you start putting in laps.
Codemasters have done it again,top quality racer . Nice balanced racer ,superb mixture of arcade and simulation.
what can i say.... i never play an F1 game soo i think that this game is not that bad.
Even it's 2016 now. This game still has lots of fun. I love the sounds of these former F1 engines.
